[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Configuration/ConfigurationReferenceState.cs] [Property: ParliamentContract] [Cross-Contract Reentrancy] When Configuration contract calls ParliamentContract methods, if Parliament calls back into Configuration before the first call completes, could this enable reentrancy attacks that bypass configuration change validations?
